Desc.eng: A short burst that fires 3 shots.
Continuous automatic fire until you release the button.
Automatic discharge, rate of fire increases to twice the starting rate under 3 seconds (by holding the attack button).
Automatic fire, rate of fire increases to three times the starting rate under 4 seconds (by holding the attack button).
Delivers automatic fire and keeps moving the character away from the target until you release the button.
Automatic fire while moving towards the target.
Delivers a single shot at the target.
Belches a continuous fire plume of burning promethium.
Area denial attack, ignites the ground upon impact.
Short-ranged promethium spray.
Continuous fire stream while disengaging from the target (by holding the attack button)
Concentrated energy discharge for increased destruction.
Single target attack that can be used to deliver precision attacks (by holding down the attack button).
Unleashes a temporal distortion that stuns armoured targets and slows soft targets.
Violent heat pulse discharge with area effect.
Heat pulse, reduces armor by 50% for 2 seconds.
Releases a sustained twin matter excitement beam. Pierces and damages all objects and enemies in its path.
Heat discharge, reduces armor by 50% for 2 seconds.
Overpressurised plasma discharge with an area effect.
Single target attack that can be chained into an attack combination with a devastating final blow.
Sweeping close-quarters attack, hits multiple enemies.
Single, powerful close-quarters blow.
Releases an energy wave that can hit multiple targets.
Sustained, disemboweling Melee attack (by holding the attack button).
Single attack that hits multiple targets around the character in melee range.
Continuous automatic fire until you release the button. Hinders enemy movement.
Delivers a single shot at the target with increased damage.
Fires 10 shots in rapid succession. The shots land in a 3m radius circle around the target, each dealing damage to all enemies within 1 meter.
Rolling fireball, hits multiple targets.
Superheated plasma discharge, hits multiple targets in a line.
Single shot, increased effect. Can be charged up to 3 seconds for increased damage (by holding the attack button). The damage increases by 100% damage/second.
Twin laser beams. Pierces all obstacles and damages all objects and enemies in its path.
Area gravity attack, light damage, hinders movement.
Gravity distortion wave with knockdown effect.
Single shotgun discharge with heavy kinetic impact.
Fires multiple, high-velocity penetrator rounds. Can be charged (by holding the attack button) for a maximum of 3 seconds, which tightens the area effect cone.
Continuous attack with slow rate of fire. Sprays anti-personnel frag rounds in the direction of the target with a wide shot spread.
Gravity distortion attack, damages multiple subjects around a primary target.
Savage gravitational area blast with a persistent secondary effect.
Sustained, cumulative laser beam with increasing damage yield. Pierces all obstacles and damages all objects and enemies in its path.
Automatic fire, shot pattern improves over time.
Automatic fire while disengaging from the target.
Area denial automatic fire with explosive munitions.
Liquid promethium stream, ingites the targets upon impact.
Launches a proximity mine to the designated location. The mine detonates and deals damage upon direct impact with an enemy or when proximity fuse is activated.
Fragmentation grenade, explodes mid-air, mangles soft targets.
Ballistic volley of explosive plasma discharges.
Armor penetrating heat pulse. Can be charged up to 3 seconds for increased damage (by holding the attack button). The damage increases by 100% damage/second.
A heat pulse that can degrade targets to radioactive slag. Killed enemies leave behind a 3 meter large area effect damage zone for 5 seconds.
Smites multiple enemies with a bouncing electric arc.
Forward dash finished with a devastating area strike.
Shield mounted defensive field. Absorbs all frontal damage for a split second.
Lacerating, sweeping shield strike.
Releases a disruptive, kinetic blast.
The caster jumps to the targeted point and executes a strike that hits multiple enemies. The maximum jump distance is 20 meters.
Combination attack with three swift strikes.
Forward move with a combination of three wide-arc strikes.
Forward dash finished with a devastating strike. The maximum dash distance is 20 meters.
Single, devastating close-quarters blow.
Throws an Anti-personnel frag grenade to the designated location.
Suppressive HE shell barrage with 2 meter blast radius.
Barrage of armour penetrating shells.
Gout of burning promethium. 15 meters long.
Long range blast, 3 meter radius area effect for 5 seconds. Minimum range is 10 meters.
Fires an unguided missile dealing explosive area damage
Fires a salvo of autocannon shells dealing explosive damage
Launches a barrage of unguided missiles that deal area damage.
Performs an aerial assault with the Jump Pack. Landing deals area damage.
Deploys a stationary sentry gun (maximum 3). It self-destructs after 60 seconds.
Anti-personnel Stun grenade.
Anti-personnel Blind grenade.
Anti-shield electromagnetic pulse grenade. Instantly reduces the targets' shield to zero.
Protective energy field, grants +20 Damage Reduce bonus for 30 seconds.\nAlso restores 100 Suppression Resist per second for 30 seconds.
Protective conversion field, grants immunity to all damage and all negative effects for 5 seconds.
Protective energy shield. It can take 2000 HP damage before collapsing.\nRestores Suppression Resist to maximum at activation.\nDoes not expire.
Xenotech scatter field, deals area damage around the caster with Knockback and Knockdown effect.
Xenotech enhancement, grants +30% Critical Hit Chance for 30 seconds.
Teleports the caster to the cursor. Maximum range is 35 meters.

Desc_controller.eng: Teleports the caster to the selected area. Maximum range is 35 meters.

Desc.eng: Creates a 10 meter radius area around the caster, that slows down all kinetic projectiles, as well as enemy movement and attack speed by 95%. The caster's attacks are counted as Surprise for the duration. The distortion field remains for 10 seconds.

On/Off skill. Can only be activated when not being attacked for 5 seconds.
Activation puts the character in stealth mode which lasts until spotted (moving within 5 meters of an enemy), until attacking or until running out of Adrenaline. 
Stealth mode drains Adrenaline at a rate of 1 point per second while standing still, movement costs 2x. 
Coming out of stealth mode bestows a Surprise bonus to attacks for 6 seconds (the duration is halved if stealth mode ends with you being spotted).
Projects hololithic duplicates of the agent as a diversion. The duplicates can fight for 60 seconds or until the destroyed, dealing Suppression damage only.
Single target attack that can be chained into a ritualistic combination attack, creating a Death Cult Combo.
Single target phasing attack, executed from close to long range. The caster can phase through creatures, but not obstacles. Carves a Death Mark into the target.
Single target combination attack. Removes all Death Marks from the target, grants +10% bonus damage per mark for every successful hit.
Attacks a single opponent, but deals electric damage to secondary targets.

Channeled spinning attack, deals damage in 360 degrees on multiple targets while moving towards the cursor (at 50% movement speed). The attack is disrupted when the caster loses more than 30% of max HP.
Long range jumping attack, deals electric damage in a large area upon impact.
Single, powerful close-quarters blow.
Releases an energy blast that can hit multiple targets.
Long range jumping attack, deals electric damage in a large area upon impact.
Long range, single target attack.Can target specific bodyparts and damage can be increased by charging.
Long range, single target attack. Can target specific bodyparts and damage can be increased by charging.
Long range, single target attack, deals explosive damage in a small area.

Long range, single target attack. Removes all Needler Toxin marks from the target and grants +2% Critical Hit Chance and +2% Critical Hit Strength for each Needler Toxin mark removed. Can target specific bodyparts and damage can be increased by charging.
Long range attack. The projectile explodes upon impact spraying the area with poisoned needles.
Area attack, deals heat damage around the target.
Overpenetrating shot, deals damage to multiple targets in its path.
Overpenetrating shot, hits multiple targets, deals 30% secondary damage within 6 meters (up to 3 targets).

The character moves to the designated position and places a mine on the ground. Only one mine can be deployed at a time. The mine can be detonated by activating the skill a second time, dealing explosive damage in a large area.

The character moves to the designated position and places a mine on the ground. Only one mine can be deployed at a time. The mine detonates when an enemy moves close to it, dealing electric damage in a large area.
Throws a delayed blast grenade to the designated location, which deals explosive damage in a large area. The grenade explodes 2 seconds after impacting the ground.

Protective energy shield with a maximum of 1000 HP, that remains active for 60 seconds.
It reflects damage back the to the attacker and stuns or slows them.
It regenerates 200 HP/second, but only when not under attack (regeneration starts if 3 seconds pass without enemy attacks).
Also restores 50 Suppression Resistance per second while active.
Single attack that gains a bonus to attack speed and Critical Chance with each strike as long as the attacks are continuous and target the same enemy. Carves a Death Mark into the target.
Area attack that gains a bonus to attack speed and Critical Chance with each strike as long as the attacks are continuous. Carves a Death Mark into the targets.
Single target phasing attack, executed from close to long range. The agent can phase through creatures, but not obstacles. Removes all Death Marks from the target, grants +10% bonus damage per mark.
Long range jumping attack, deals poison damage in a large area upon impact. Carves a Death Mark into the targets.
Single target attack that can be chained into a ritualistic combination attack, creating a Death Cult Combo. Places a Needler Toxin mark on the target with each hit.
Single attack that jumps to a maximum of 6 other enemies within 10 meters of the first target. Places a Needler Toxin mark on the target with each hit.
Single attack that hits the target 3 times. Removes all Needler Toxin marks from the target, grants +10% bonus damage per mark.
Channeled attack, deals damage on multiple targets in a cone while moving towards the cursor (at 50% movement speed). The attack is disrupted when the caster loses more than 30% of max HP.
Single target attack that can be chained into a ritualistic combination attack, creating a Lightning Combo.
Knocks down and deals electric damage in 360° to enemies within 10 meters of the character.
The character performs a long distance backflip and creates an explosion at the starting position.
The character slides to the designated position. Enemies hit by the slide are knocked down and take elecric damage.
Long range, single target attack that deals Kinetic damage.
Long range, single target attack that deals Heat damage.
Long range area attack that deals Heat damage.
Single target, psy-enhanced Melee strike.
Single target, chain bio-lightning discharge that hits up to 3 more enemies within 5 meters.
Single target, long range phasing attack.
Long range area attack that deals Physical and Warp damage.
Kinetic blast that penetrates and knocks back multiple targets (10 meters long).
Long range area attack that deals Heat and Warp damage.
Launches 3 homing force bolts at the target dealing Warp damage.
Grants +15% damage reduction to the caster for 30 seconds.
+20% Melee damage
Grants +15% damage reduction to the caster for {duration} seconds.
+10% damage bonus
+[ff2bede6]5%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus to Melee skills.
+4% Maximum Health and +2% Damage to you and nearby allies (stacks with other players' Holy Conclave).
Successful Deflects provide a stacking [ff2bede6]5%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus to the next attack (maximum 50%).
+50% damage.
+25% damage and -25% cooldown to all weapon attacks for {duration} seconds (does not stack).
+25% damage and -25% cooldown to all weapon attacks for 15 seconds (does not stack).
Deals Warp damage to a single enemy if the target has no Suppression bar or its Suppression status is red.
Medium range force discharge that deals Warp damage.
Long range area attack that Stuns or Slows enemies.
Long range area attack that deals Warp damage and causes Bleeding.

Summons 3 columns of fire on the nearest enemies. The columns follow their targets and deal Heat damage for 5 seconds. Holding the attack button creates 2 additional columns per second on the nearest enemies not yet targeted by one. The caster suffers additional Warp Heat and instant Warp damage for each extra column created.
Long range area attack that deals Heat damage and ignites targets.
Creates a column of fire for 20 seconds that seeks out enemies and deals Heat damage.
Channeled beam attack that deals Heat damage.

Creates a fiery aura around the character for 10 seconds that deals continuous Heat damage to enemies it touches. It also provides +15% Damage Reduction, +50% damage to Heat attacks and +20% damage to other attacks.
A fiery aura for 10 seconds that deals Heat damage, provides +15% Damage Reduction, +50% damage to Heat attacks and +20% damage to other attacks.
Long range attack that ignites a single enemy, dealing Heat damage. If the target is killed by the initial attack, an explosion occurs that deals damage to enemies within 3 meters.
100% Damage Reduction bonus for 60 seconds. Each hit suffered reduces the duration by 5 seconds and generates 2 Warp Heat.
100% Damage Reduction bonus for 60 seconds. Each hit suffered reduces the bonus by 5%.
+50% damage bonus to kinetic attacks for 30 seconds. Also reduces shot spread.
+50% damage bonus to kinetic attacks for 20 seconds. Also reduces shot spread.
Changes the armour category of Heavily Armored enemies to Armoured and Armoured enemies to Unarmoured against the caster's attacks for 30 seconds.
-40 to enemy armour

A protective ward that remains active until triggered by an attack that would kill the character. It averts the death blow, heals the character to 50% Health and 50% Suppression Resistance, but also adds 65 Warp Heat (does not stack).

A protective ward that remains active until triggered by an attack that would kill the character. It averts the death blow, heals the character to 50% Health and 50% Suppression Resistance, but also adds 65 Warp Heat (does not stack).
+25 Dodge against all Ranged attacks for 30 seconds.
+40 Dodge against all Ranged attacks for 20 seconds.
For the duration of 30 seconds, the first hit on each target deals +100% damage.
The first hit on each target deals +100% damage.
Long range attack that deals kinetic damage in a 2 meter wide streak and destroys cover.
Long range single target attack that deals Warp damage.
Knocks targets down and deals Warp damage in 360° around the character within a 6 meter radius.

Creates a 6 meter radius force dome that moves with the caster. Allies under the dome have +30% damage reduction bonus against Ranged attacks. The bonus does not apply against attackers inside the dome. Duration: {duration} sec
Channeled area effect attack that deals continuous Warp damage to enemies around the caster, regardless of cover.
Toggle on/off levitation skill. Provides +25% Movement speed and the ability to bypass traps and mines undetected. Using any other skill automatically turns levitation off.

Conjures an immobile aura that stops time for 30 seconds. The psyker can move normally, but every meter traveled reduces the duration by 0.5 seconds. Attacking an enemy stuck in the aura reduces duration by 5 seconds (channeled attacks cost the same, but per second). DoT durations are unaffected.
Teleports the psyker to the designated location.

Projects the psyker's presence over the physical world for 10 seconds. In this disembodied form, the psyker can move around, passing through doors, obstacles (but not walls) before returning to the body he left behind. Enemies within 3 meters are marked and suffer +100% damage penalty for 30 seconds when the Scrier's Gaze is over.
A heavy laser beam strikes the designated location, deals massive damage and knocks surviving enemies down.
Several artillery strikes the designated location, deals massive damage on enemies.
Deploys a sentry gun. Automatically targets enemies and deals area damage.
Deploys a cluster of 10 mines. The mines explode and deal area damage to proximity targets.
Grants +50 % damage boost for you and for all allies in 10 m range for 10 seconds.
Teleports a Space Marine to your location as reinforcement.
Grants +25% bonus to movement speed and attack speed for you and for all allies in 10 m range for 10 seconds.
Grants +25% bonus to movement speed and attack speed for you and for all allies in 10 m range for 10 seconds.
Deploys a cluster of 10 mines. The mines explode and deal area damage to proximity targets.
Designates the target for teleportation. Channeled.
Activates the listed effects.
Fires a shot of shotgun pellets, damaging all enemies in a cone in front of the character.
Fires several shots in quick succession, damaging all enemies in a cone in front of the character.
Increases the Damage by 15%.
Increases the Damage by 30%.
Grants invulnerability and increases the Critical Strength by 30%.
Restores 10 HP and 10 Suppression Resist per second.
Increases the Suppression Damage by 50%. Stun, Freeze, Slow and Shock effects created by the player remain active 2 seconds longer.
Increases the Damage by 10% against all enemies and by 30% against Blinded enemies.
A continuous beam that decreases your Damage Reduction by 50%.
Grants Slow and Vulnerability and decreases your Damage by 30%.
Increases your Damage by 50% for the duration.
Increases your Damage Reduction by 20% for the duration.
Increases your Movement Speed by 25% for the duration.
{damage,100} damage
+20% damage, and +5% damage/stack.
+ {keen_fury_crit_hit_tag} Critical Hit Chance and + {keen_fury_crit_str_tag} Critical Hit Strength.
Increases damage done by force weapon attacks by {force_weapon_mastery_tag}
Increases damage done by psychic powers by {psychic_escalation_tag}
Reduces the cooldown of psychic powers by {psychic_sequence_tag}
+ 3 to Dodge.
+ {exalted_by_murder_tag} to All damage.
Increases your Damage and highly increases your Suppression Damage for the duration.
Increases your Damage, Critical Hit Chance and Dodge for the duration.
Fires a long-range shot at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies within 4 meters of the impact point.
Fires a focused heat pulse at a single target.
Fires a continuous energy beam that deals damage to all enemies near the impact point.
Ignites the knight's void shield, that absorbs attacks from a 180° frontal arc. Can absorb a total of 15000 points damage before collapsing.
Single shot from the main cannon of the Shadowsword in the direction the tank faces. Utterly demolishes all targets in a straight line.
Continuous pulsed shots from the sponson lascannons of the tank.
The crew of the tank repairs 500 health/second over 10 seconds.
+50% Damage to Force weapons
Bonus Melee Damage
+50% Melee Damage
+20% Damage and +10% Damage Reduce
+20% Movement Speed
+10% Movement Speed
+20% Movement Speed
+20% Damage
+200 Hp/sec and +20% Damage
+5% Damage Reduce
Immune to damage
Several artillery strikes the designated location, deals massive damage on enemies.
[ff99cccc]Teleports in a Stormwatcher space marine who fights on your side with ranged combat style. (Only one can be present at a time.)[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Teleports in a Stormwatcher space marine who fights on your side with melee combat style. (Only one can be present at a time.)[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc][ff99cccc]Deploys a cluster of 10 mines. The mines explode and deal area damage to proximity targets.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]+50% Duration and +50% Damage to all DoT effects.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]The Overheat bar is increased by 50%.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]+50% magazine size and -50% reload time to all weapons with a magazine.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]-50% Warp Heat to all psychic powers.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Weapons with a magazine have a +10 % to instantly kill the target with each shot (excluding Boss, Villains and Elite enemies).[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]50% chance to apply Shock to the target with each hit.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]+15% Damage[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]+500 HP[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]10% Increased area for all Area of Effect skills.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Effect range for Cone and Path skills is increased by 50%.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Reduces single target skill cooldown by 25% (excluding salvo skills).[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Reduces bullet spread of all ranged skills by 3.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Incoming damage is maximised in 750 Hp/hit.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]50% chance to regain 1 charge after each innoculator use.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]50% chance to regain 1 charge after each Support skill use.[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]20% chance to deal double damage with each hit (Pistols, Rifles, Heavy guns only)[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Critical hits have a 25% chance to deal +50% Damage (Pistols, Rifles, Heavy guns only)[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]+100% to Suppression Resistance[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Critical hits have a 25% chance to activate a buff for 2 seconds that reflects 50% of incoming damage to enemies (non-stacking).[/ff99cccc]
[ff99cccc]Each incoming hit that deals more than 500 Hp has a 25% chance to activate a buff that regenerates 200HP/second for 5 secseconds (non-stacking).[/ff99cccc]

Allows targeting weak spots. Activated by holding the attack button and selecting a bodypart in the appearing circular menu. Hitting different bodyparts provides various advantages. Damage can be increased by charging (by +100% per second, up to 3 seconds).
-1% movement speed penalty for every needler hit (stacking). The penalties expire after 10 seconds.
Instant overheat for increased damage. The colder was the weapon before the shot, the higher the damage bonus (up to +300% damage).
Each attack targets a single enemy.
-1% attack damage penalty to the target for 10 seconds. Can be stacked.
Each attack delivered in the combo increases attack speed, Critical Hit Chance and Critical Hit power, up to a maximum of 5 attacks.
Paralyzes the target until the channeled attack is finished.
+30% damage, +5% Critical Hit Chance and +30 Dodge bonus for the duration.
Penetrates multiple targets, stopped by obstacles.
Allows targeting weak spots. Activated by holding the attack button and selecting a bodypart in the appearing circular menu. Hitting different bodyparts provides various advantages.
Throws a grenade to the designated location, which deals explosive damage in a large area. The throw arc can be increased by holding down the button.
The effect is created directly on the target.
Effects the caster.
The skill's area of effect is 5 meter radius circle, around the caster.
The skill's area of effect is 3 meter radius circle, around the caster.
The skill's area of effect is 10 meter radius circle, around the caster.
The skill's area of effect is a 160° wide, 5 meters long cone.
The skill's area of effect is a 30° wide, 10 meters long cone.
The skill's area of effect is a 60° wide, 3 meters long cone.
2 meters wide, 10 meters long area attack.
The skill's area of effect is 3 meter radius circle.
2 meter radius.
The skill's area of effect is 6 meter radius circle.
The damage jumps to secondary targets within 6 meters (up to 4 times).
Delivers a 3 shot burst to the target.
3 second charging time (by holding the attack button).
Low velocity (10m/s).
Continuous effect (by holding the attack button).

The character moves to the designated position and places a mine on the ground. A maximum of 3 mines can be deployed at any one time (deploying a fourth mine destroys the first one). The mine activates when an enemy moves close to it.
Activates upon impact.
Rebounds from obstacles, detonates on enemies. Self-destructs after 5 seconds.
Sustained automatic fire until you release the button.
While channeled (by holding the attack button), the damage increases by 40% damage/sec, (maximum +120%).
+40% armour for 3 seconds.
Ignores 50% of armour.
Completely ingores armour.
Damage decreases over distance (-5% per meter).
Activates when making continuous attacks. Every fifth attack deals +500% damage.
+30% damage to unarmoured targets.

instant.eng: Instant activation, unaffected by Stun, Fear, etc.

Desc.eng: 5 second duration.
Ignores the target's shield.
+100% damage to the target's shield.
Deals fire damage equal to 20% of original hit damage per second, for 5 seconds.
Deals toxic damage equal to 20% of original hit damage per second, for 5 seconds.
Deals slash damage equal to 20% of original hit damage per second, for 5 seconds.
Deals warp damage equal to 20% of original hit damage per second, for 5 seconds.
Targets are forced back. Affects only against targets with yellow Suppression Resistance.
Disables the target for 3 seconds. Affects only against targets with red Suppression Resistance.
Disables the target for a brief time.
Applies -40% movement and attack speed to the targets for 5 seconds. Affects only against targets with yellow Suppression Resistance.
Applies 40% miss chance and -20% movement speed to the targets for 5 seconds. Affects only against targets with yellow Suppression Resistance.
Applies -40% movement speed to the targets for 5 seconds. Affects only against targets with yellow Suppression Resistance.
Disables the target for 3 seconds. Affects only against targets with red Suppression Resistance.
The target receives +10% physical damage for 5 seconds (stacks up to 10x).
The target receives +10% heat damage for 5 seconds (stacks up to 10x).
The target receives +10% warp damage for 5 seconds (stacks up to 10x).
The target flees for 3 seconds. Affects only against targets with red Suppression Resistance.
The target misses 80% of its attacks for 5 seconds. Affects only against targets with yellow Suppression Resistance.
+10% Critical Hit Chance.
4° shot spread.
8° shot spread.
12° shot spread.
Attacks a single target.
Can be charged up to 3 seconds for increased damage (by holding the attack button). The damage increases by 100% damage/second.
-30% damage to armoured targets.
+30% damage to armoured targets.
+50% damage to Elite and Champion creatures.
5 meters.
+10% damage for each meter travelled.
Deals damage 360° around the character.
Prevents the use of abilities. Affects only against targets with red Suppression Resistance.
Target cannot heal for 20 seconds. Affects only against targets with yellow Suppression Resistance.
Low damage to cover.
High damage to cover.
Extreme damage to cover.
Minimal Suppression damage.
2x Suppression damage.
5x Suppression damage.
+30% damage on targets closer than 10 meters.
Targets are knocked to the ground. Affects only against targets with red Suppression Resistance.
Rate of fire increases gradually during sustained fire.
Deals double damage to psychic enemies and Restrains them (preventing them from using psychic abilities for 10 seconds).
Lightning jumps to other enemies within 10 meters of the target. The number of additional targets increases with each strike as long as the attacks are continuous and target the same enemy.
Blessing effect that bestows temporary bonuses.
Increases area of effect by 25% or adds 1 to the number of targets affected by the skill.
Increases skill duration by 50%
Increases skill effectiveness
Decreases Warp Heat cost of the skill by 25%.
Reduces skill cooldown by 25%.
Adds the Armour Piercing tag to the skill.
Adds the Armour Breaking tag to the skill.
Adds the Knockback tag to the skill.
Adds the Knockdown tag to the skill.
Adds the Stun tag to the skill.
Adds the Slow tag to the skill.
Adds the Shock tag to the skill.
Adds the Blind tag to the skill.
Adds the Vulnerability tag to the skill.
Adds the Damage Over Time tag to the skill.
Converts half of the damage from the skill to Warp type.
Increases Critical Chance by 10%.
Increases Suppression damage by 50%.
Increases damage dealt to covers by 50%.
Attaches health drain to the skill (10 HP per hit).
Attaches suppression drain to the skill (10 Suppression per hit).
Extends the effect of the skill to nearby allies as well.
Attaches health regeneration to the skill (10 HP per second).
Attaches suppression regeneration to the skill (10 Suppression per second).
Increases Warp Resistance by 10.
Increases Movement Speed by 10.
Increases all damage by 10%.
